formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation:
Script to evaluate. The following variables are accessible:
storage - storage client ef - ElectricFlow Groovy API client zone - zone name from the configuration project - project ID from the configuration wrapper - Storage wrapper from this plugin
Both wrapper and compute clients are already initialized.
formElement.label: Script:
formElement.value: println "Storage raw client: $storage" println "Project ID: $project" println "Flow Client: $ef" println "Storage Wrapper: $wrapper"
